extensions.definition: Generative AI component producing factually incorrect or nonsensical output.
examples: Chatbot diagnostic assistant invented a non-existent drug interaction.
Radiology AI highlighted a tumor in empty space.

extensions.definition: disruption of quantum sensor readings due to external coherence loss.
examples: MRI quantum sensor lost coherence due to nearby 5G tower.

extensions.definition: Malicious encryption of device data demanding payment.
examples: Insulin pump locked by ransomware requiring bitcoin payment.

extensions.definition: Counterfeit raw materials introduced into the supply chain.
examples: Received barrels of fake glycerin containing diethylene glycol.
